gameintro.content: D.W. and I are on the Read family farm!
We're exploring the corn mazes at night to see what animals and rocks we can find!

menu_instruct_pickup.content: Tap a jar to look for that animal in a maze!
For more animals, tap the arrow!

maze_instruct.content: Press the arrows onscreen or on your keyboard to move us
Hold down the arrows to walk faster.

maze_find_frog.content: Help D.W. and me find one frog and three rocks.

maze_find_moth.content: Help D.W. and me find one luna moth and three rocks.

maze_find_skink.content: Help D.W. and me find one skink and three rocks.

maze_find_cicada.content: Help D.W. and me find one cicada and three rocks.

frog_fact_1.content: When northern green frogs are underwater, they breathe through their skin!
I wish I could do that!

frog_fact_2.content: Northern green frogs' bulging eyes help them see really well!

frog_fact_3.content: Northern green frogs have eardrums on the sides of their heads, but no ears!

moth_fact_1.content: Adult luna moths don't have mouths!

moth_fact_2.content: Luna moths are most active around midnight.
I wonder how they stay up so late.

moth_fact_3.content: Female luna moths can lay over 600 eggs in a week!

skink_fact_1.content: Fun fact! Young skinks have blue tails! They look really fancy!

skink_fact_2.content: Skinks eat large insects like beetles and crickets, plus spiders!

skink_fact_3.content: Skinks can drop their tails off to help them escape, then grow them back!

cicada_fact_1.content: Some cicadas come back every year.
They show up in late June or August.

cicada_fact_2.content: Fun fact! Some cicadas show up only once every 13 or 17 years! Weird!

cicada_fact_3.content: Cicadas make a loud buzzing sound that can be heard a mile away!

maze_found_redcalcite.content: D.W. thinks it's as beautiful as a sunset!

maze_found_orangecalcite.content: D.W. thinks it's as amazing as a shooting star!

maze_found_yellowcalcite.content: D.W. thinks it's as bright as birthday candles!

maze_found_bluecalcite.content: D.W. thinks it's as sparkly as Uni’s eyes!

maze_found_greencalcite.content: D.W. thinks it's as a sparkly as a glitter pen!

maze_found_celestite.content: D.W. thinks it's as blue as the ocean!

maze_found_flint.content: D.W. thinks it's as perfect as the perfect snowball!

maze_found_fluorite.content: D.W. thinks it's as beautiful as a pony's mane!

maze_found_pinkquartz.content: D.W. thinks it's as spectacular as a diamond castle!

maze_found_yellowquartz.content: D.W. thinks it's as pretty as Nadine’s ponytail!

wonder5.content: It's dark out here, but we're not scared!

wonder6.content: I love to hear the crickets!

wonder10.content: It's like we're walking in a dream!

wonder11.content: This is tough, but we can handle it!

wonder12.content: Nature at night is so cool!

wonder13.content: It's like a whole other world out here!

maze_complete_exit.content: Now let's find the way out.

maze_entered.content: This is where we came in!
We can't go out this way.

menu_letgo.content: We'll keep it for a while, and then let it go.

menu_found_nothing.content: We made it through the maze!
Remember, in each maze we're trying to collect one animal and three rocks.

menu_again_another.content: We can try that maze again, or explore another!

menu_timeout.content: Remember, tap a jar to choose an animal to find in a maze, or tap an arrow to see more.

maze_reminder_faster.content: Remember, you can always hold down the arrows to walk faster.

maze_walls.content: Oops! We can't walk through the corn walls.

maze_found_greenquartz.content: D.W. thinks it's as magical as a firefly!

maze_found_purplequartz.content: D.W. thinks it's as shiny as a golden crown!
